name: Script tag displaying alert (double quotes version)
description: Test proper escaping of html script tag
expected_result: You shoud see script html tag with alert call inside. No alert message should be displayed.

name: Script tag displaying alert (single quotes version)
description: Test proper escaping of html script tag
expected_result: You shoud see script html tag with alert call inside. No alert message should be displayed.

name: Four backslash characters
description: Test proper escaping of backslash character
expected_result: You should see exactly four unescaped backslash characters

name: test unicode characters
description: Test proper displaying of unicode characters
expected_result: You should see exactly 16 characters, first 8 lowercase, last 8 uppercase
